text: John Kofi Agyekum Kufuor (born 8 December 1938) is a Ghanaian politician. He was President of Ghana from 7 January 2001 to 7 January 2009. He was also Chairperson of the African Union from 2007 to 2008. ==References== ==Other websites== *The John A. Kufuor Foundation *Ghana-pedia webpage – John K.A.
